channel.title: Help lol
channel.description:
can any1 help me i made my 508 client load 540 items and it works and all but i need my server to let me weild them lol
EDIT:
i know how to do but when i did it i was weilding wrong item lol and just so u know im not loading 540 cache i just expanded item list and added items and 1 more thing it doesnt use ints =D
Example:
i weilded stat pl8body and heres wat happened [IMG]http://i938.photobucket.com/albums/ad228/erand_album/Screen08.jpg[/img]
